name: Rainy Day (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Rainy Day (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
By Keira A. and Erica Y.

You are home alone in a rainy day and your room is beginning to flood! Close all the windows and escape from the room without touching the water!

controls:
up, down, left, right
press space to start
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
